title: Evaluation of Public Health Emergency Management in China: A Systematic Review
text: Based on the characteristics of the included studies and the extracted data, qualitative data were used to analyze the collected research data
authors: Wang, Jia; Yuan, Beibei; Li, Zhengmao; Wang, Zhifeng

title: Investigating public health emergency response information system initiatives in China
text:
The data collection system utilizes various technologies to capture images, graphs, statistical data, professional data, public health surveillance data, and textual data
 The data collected for PHERIS are heterogeneous
 Data storage technologies include both centralized and distributed database management models
